titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for making currant certaine French coyne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: "Given at the Court at Tichfield the fourth day of September, in the first yeere of His Maiesties Reigne of Great Brittaine, France, and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
